alert.note: Alert for Custer; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perkins, southeastern Keith, Lincoln, southeastern Logan, southwestern Custer and north central Hayes Counties through 600 PM CDT/500 PM MDT/... At 530 PM CDT/430 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Gothenburg to near Dickens. Movement was northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Sutherland, Hershey, Arnold, Brady, Wallace, Maxwell, Dickens, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Keith, Logan, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Etna, Coker, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, O`Fallons, Birdwood and Somerset. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 233 and 249. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 150 and 206. Highway 83 between mile markers 58 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins
